series: Archive report / Ghana Geological Survey Department -- no. 54
title: Geology and mineral resources of the northwestern part of the Kintampo area
by_statement: by M. Nikoulshin and S. Bobrov ; compiled and edited by I.A. Jakovlev and G.O. Kesse (December 1978) with the assistance of United Nations Development Programme, Project GHA/72/010.

notes.value:
The authors wrote the report in 1963 but was unpublished.

LC copy lacks accompanying maps.

Includes bibliographical references (leaves 82-86).
